SHEHU IDRIS  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in  
Mathematics, Biology/Health Science 
and any three (3) from the following: 
Nutrition, Chemistry, Physics, Religious  
Studies, Geography, Economics, 
Nigerian Language Plus at least a pass 
in English Language, Food and 
Nutrition/Home Management.

SHEHU IDRIS requires five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English Language, Biology/Health 
Science, any one (1) of Chemistry, Food and 
Nutrition/Home Economics, Physics or 
Geography and two (2) subjects chosen from 
Economics, Accounts, Commerce, Agricultura l 
Science, Government and Social Science.  
NKST-COTECH requires ‘O’ level credit pass in 
English Language.

SHIM-LUTH requires five (5) O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Biology, Chemistry or Physics and other subject.  
SHIM-UCH and SHIM -UBTH requires five (5) O’ 
level credit passes to include English Language,  
Mathematics,  Biology/Health  Science, 
Chemistry/Physics and any other subject as 
course requirement.  
SHIM-UCH requires any of Mathematics, Biology, 
Physics/Chemistry and Biology as UTME 
subjects.  
OAUTHC requires Mathematics, Biology and any 
one of Physics, Chemistry, Geography, 
Economics and Government as UTME subjects.  
SHIM-UMTH requires Mathematics and 
Biology/Health Science and any other subject as 
UTME subject.
